name: Shadow of Engimor
description:
Glory to the Kingdom of Engimor!
Ah the Kingdom of Engimor A majestic place unfortunately with the unfortunate fate of being consumed by darkness. There seems to be no hope, but then out of nowhere he appears. The Guardian of Kings is a beacon of hope in this world who is ready to help the kingdom and his king survive.

Explore. Kingdom of Engimor is not only the beauty of the castle, but also beautiful fields and forests, as well as abandoned mines and secret passages
Enemies.The Darkness is gaining strength and throwing its forces against the Guardian of Kings. Will he be able to overcome them and reach his goal?
Story. Get a closer look at the story of the Guardian of Kings' mission and his ally.

But that's just the beginning! We aim not only to create an engaging gameplay but also to support you throughout your journey. Get ready for endless adventures, because we promise regular free updates that will expand your experience and introduce new possibilities into our world.
New levels, characters, and much more await you in future updates. We believe every player deserves full access to content, so our updates will be absolutely free. Our team is committed to creating the best gaming experience, and we invite you to be part of our amazing journey.
